short.ar: متعقب البريد الإلكتروني لـ Gmail & Mail Merge مع أكثر من 2 مليون مستخدم نشط. تتبع مجاني وغير محدود للبريد الإلكتروني
short.am: የኢሜል መከታተያ ለጂሜይል እና ደብዳቤ ውህደት ከ2 ሚሊዮን በላይ ንቁ ተጠቃሚዎች። ነፃ እና ያልተገደበ የኢሜይል ክትትል
short.bg: Имейл тракер за Gmail и Mail Merge с над 2 милиона активни потребители. Безплатно и неограничено проследяване на имейли
short.bn: 2 মিলিয়নেরও বেশি সক্রিয় ব্যবহারকারীর সাথে Gmail এবং মেল একত্রিত করার জন্য ইমেল ট্র্যাকার। বিনামূল্যে এবং সীমাহীন ইমেল ট্র্যাকিং
short.ca: Tracking de correus per a Gmail i Mail Merge amb més de 2 milions d'usuaris actius. Tracking de correus gratuït i il·limitat.
short.cs: Sledování e-mailů pro Gmail a hromadnou korespondenci s více než 2 miliony uživatelů. Bezplatné a neomezené sledování e-mailů.
short.da: E-mail-tracker til Gmail & Mail Merge med over 2 millioner aktive brugere. Gratis og ubegrænset e-mail-sporing.
short.de: E-Mail-Tracker für Gmail & Mail Merge mit über 2 Millionen aktiven Benutzern. Kostenlose und unbegrenzte E-Mail-Verfolgung.
short.el: Παρακολούθηση email για συγχώνευση Gmail & Mail με 2 εκατομμύρια χρήστες. Δωρεάν και απεριόριστη παρακολούθηση email.
short.en,en_AU: Email tracker and mail merge with over 2 million active users. Free and unlimited Gmail mass email tracker.
short.en_GB,en_US: Gmail mail merge and mass email tracker with 2 million+ users. Free, unlimited email tracking to boost outreach and email marketing.
short.es,es_419: Email tracker para Gmail y Mail Merge con más de 2 millones de usuarios activos. Tracking de emails gratuito e ilimitado.
short.et: Meilijälgija Gmaili ja kirjakooste jaoks üle 2 miljoni aktiivse kasutajaga. Tasuta ja piiramatu e-posti jälgimine.
short.fa: ردیاب ایمیل برای Gmail & Mail Merge با بیش از 2 میلیون کاربر فعال. ردیابی ایمیل رایگان و نامحدود.
short.fi: Sähköpostiseuranta Gmailille ja Yhdistelmälle yli 2 miljoonalla käyttäjällä. Ilmainen ja rajoittamaton sähköpostin seuranta.
short.fil: Email tracker para sa Gmail at Mail Merge na may mahigit 2 milyong aktibong user. Libre at walang limitasyong pagsubaybay sa email.
short.fr: Email tracker pour Gmail & Mail Merge avec plus de 2 millions d'utilisateurs actifs. Suivi des e-mails gratuit et illimité.
short.gu: 2 મિલિયનથી વધુ સક્રિય વપરાશકર્તાઓ સાથે Gmail અને મેઇલ મર્જ માટે ઇમેઇલ ટ્રેકર. મફત અને અમર્યાદિત ઇમેઇલ ટ્રેકિંગ.
short.he: מעקב דואייל עבור Gmail ומיזוג דואר עם למעלה מ-2 מיליון משתמשים פעילים. מעקב אימייל חינם וללא הגבלה.
short.hi: 2 मिलियन से अधिक सक्रिय उपयोगकर्ताओं के साथ जीमेल और मेल मर्ज के लिए ईमेल ट्रैकर। निःशुल्क और असीमित ईमेल ट्रैकिंग।
short.hr: Praćenje e-pošte za Gmail i spajanje pisama s više od 2 milijuna aktivnih korisnika. Besplatno i neograničeno praćenje e-pošte.
short.hu: E-mail nyomkövető a Gmailhez és a levelezőegyesítéshez több mint 2 millió aktív felhasználóval. Ingyenes és korlátlan e-mail követés
short.id: Pelacak email untuk Gmail & Mail Merge dengan lebih dari 2 juta pengguna aktif. Pelacakan email gratis dan tidak terbatas.
short.it: Tracker email per Gmail e Mail Merge con oltre 2 milioni di utenti attivi. Monitoraggio e-mail gratuito e illimitato.
short.ja: 200 万人以上のアクティブ ユーザーを持つ Gmail と差し込み印刷のメール トラッカー。無料で無制限のメール追跡。
short.kn: 2 ಮಿಲಿಯನ್‌ಗಿಂತಲೂ ಹೆಚ್ಚು ಸಕ್ರಿಯ ಬಳಕೆದಾರರೊಂದಿಗೆ Gmail ಮತ್ತು ಮೇಲ್ ವಿಲೀನಕ್ಕಾಗಿ ಇಮೇಲ್ ಟ್ರ್ಯಾಕರ್. ಉಚಿತ ಮತ್ತು ಅನಿಯಮಿತ ಇಮೇಲ್ ಟ್ರ್ಯಾಕಿಂಗ್.
short.ko: 2백만 명 이상의 활성 사용자가 있는 Gmail 및 편지 병합용 이메일 추적기. 무료 및 무제한 이메일 추적.
short.lt: El. pašto stebėjimo priemonė, skirta „Gmail“ ir „Mail Merge“ su 2 milijonais vartotojų. Nemokamas ir neribotas el. pašto stebėjimas.
short.lv: E-pasta izsekotājs Gmail un pasta sapludināšanai ar vairāk nekā 2 miljoniem lietotāju. Bezmaksas un neierobežota e-pasta izsekošana.
short.ml: 2 ദശലക്ഷത്തിലധികം ഉപയോക്താക്കളുള്ള Gmail & മെയിൽ ലയനത്തിനുള്ള ഇമെയിൽ ട്രാക്കർ. സൗജന്യവും പരിധിയില്ലാത്തതുമായ ഇമെയിൽ ട്രാക്കിംഗ്.
short.mr: 2 दशलक्षाहून अधिक सक्रिय वापरकर्त्यांसह Gmail आणि मेल मर्जसाठी ईमेल ट्रॅकर. विनामूल्य आणि अमर्यादित ईमेल ट्रॅकिंग.
short.ms: Penjejak e-mel untuk Gmail & Mail Merge dengan lebih 2 juta pengguna aktif. Penjejakan e-mel percuma dan tanpa had.
short.nl: E-mailtracker voor Gmail & Mail Merge met meer dan 2 miljoen actieve gebruikers. Gratis en onbeperkte e-mailtracking.
short.no: E-postsporing for Gmail og Mail Merge med over 2 millioner aktive brukere. Gratis og ubegrenset e-postsporing.
short.pl: Bezpłatne i nieograniczone narzędzie do śledzenia poczty e-mail dla Gmaila i korespondencji seryjnej z 2 milionami użytkowników.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Rastreador de e-mail para Gmail e mala direta com mais de 2 milhões de usuários ativos. Rastreamento de e-mail gratuito e ilimitado.
short.ro: Tracker e-mail pentru Gmail și Mail Merge cu peste 2 milioane de utilizatori activi. Urmărire e-mail gratuită și nelimitată.
short.ru: Бесплатный и неограниченный трекер электронной почты для Gmail и Mail Merge с 2 миллионами пользователей.
short.sk: E-mailový sledovač pre Gmail a hromadnú korešpondenciu s 2 miliónmi používateľov. Bezplatné a neobmedzené sledovanie e-mailov.
short.sl: Sledilnik e-pošte za Gmail in spajanje dokumentov z več kot 2 milijonoma uporabnikov. Brezplačno in neomejeno sledenje e-pošti.
short.sr: Праћење е-поште за Гмаил и спајање поште са преко 2 милиона активних корисника. Бесплатно и неограничено праћење е-поште.
short.sv: E-postspårare för Gmail och Mail Merge med över 2 miljoner aktiva användare. Gratis och obegränsad e-postspårning.
short.sw: Kifuatiliaji cha barua pepe cha Gmail & Mail Unganisha na watumiaji milioni 2. Ufuatiliaji wa barua pepe wa bure na usio na kikomo.
short.ta: 2 மில்லியனுக்கும் அதிகமான பயனர்களுடன் Gmail & Mail Merge க்கான மின்னஞ்சல் டிராக்கர். இலவச மற்றும் வரம்பற்ற மின்னஞ்சல் கண்காணிப்பு.
short.te: Gmail కోసం ఇమెయిల్ ట్రాకర్ & మెయిల్ 2 మిలియన్లకు పైగా క్రియాశీల వినియోగదారులతో విలీనం. ఉచిత మరియు అపరిమిత ఇమెయిల్ ట్రాకింగ్.
short.th: ตัวติดตามอีเมลสำหรับ Gmail และ Mail Merge ที่มีผู้ใช้งานมากกว่า 2 ล้านคน การติดตามอีเมลฟรีและไม่จำกัด
short.tr: 2 milyondan fazla aktif kullanıcıyla Gmail ve Adres Mektup Birleştirme için e-posta izleyici. Ücretsiz ve sınırsız e-posta takibi.
short.uk: Безкоштовний і необмежений засіб відстеження електронної пошти для Gmail і Mail Merge з 2 мільйонами користувачів.
short.vi: Trình theo dõi email cho Gmail & Mail Merge với hơn 2 triệu người dùng đang hoạt động. Theo dõi email miễn phí và không giới hạn.
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: Gmail 和 Mail Merge 的电子邮件跟踪器，拥有超过 200 万活跃用户。免费且无限制的电子邮件跟踪。

long.am,ar,bn,et,fi,fil:
Free and unlimited tracking for Gmail. Mailtrack is a personal email marketing tool with Campaigns, Mail Merge and PDF document tracking from Gmail. 

Why should you use Mailtrack? 
- free email tracker for Gmail
- 108,000 paying subscribers
- 2 million active users
- 8 million registered users
- Security audit by Google
- GDPR compliant
- Patented Technology
- Top reviews: 4,5 stars from over 10,000 reviews
- Personal Email marketing tool: Send campaigns with Mail Merge
- Featured in Forbes, Mashable, Inc, Lifehacker…
- Used by professionals in: Uber, Indeed, Randstad, Keller Williams, Compass..

How to use our mail tracker app?
- Install Mailtrack read receipts extension
- Sends emails normally: Mailtrack will track all your emails automatically
- Open your “Sent emails” folder to see read receipt status
- One checkmark ✓ means that your email has been sent, but not opened. 
- Two checkmarks ✓✓ mean that your email has been opened.
- Hover the mouse over the checkmarks to know exactly when and how many times your email has been opened 

MAILTRACK BENEFITS
- Higher open rates and response rates than any other emailtracker
- Reach the Inbox: your emails are less likely to end up in promotions or spam.
- Best deliverability ever for a email marketing tool
- Easy follow-up with alerts
- Mail Merge connect with Google Sheets
- Bulk email features for mail marketing & Gmail templates

FEATURES
✓ Free and Unlimited email tracking: Track as many emails as you like. 
✓Track group emails individually: know exactly who opened your email
✓ Follow-up email alerts: when not opened, not replied, opened very much… 
✓ Link tracking: know when someone clicks on the links in your mails.
✓ Campaigns: personal email marketing tool. Send  individually tracked emails to up to 1,000 recipients at a time in combination with Mail Merge
✓ Mail Merge: Customized emails extracting data from Google Sheets
✓ PDF Tracking: Know when your PDF documents are opened
✓ Tracking Certificates: serve as proof that your emails have been delivered.
✓ Daily Reports: Receive by email a summary of the previous day’s tracking activity.
✓ Salesforce / CRM integration 
✓ CSV data Export with Mail Merge
✓ Works on iOS & Android: Send tracked mails from your phone’s Gmail app
✓ Email & phone support

WHEN TO USE MAILTRACK
- Job search: know whether your resume has been opened by the recruiter or not
- Sending Quotes: know if your your potential clients are engaged
- Invoices: know wether your bill been received or not
- Newsletters: send up to 1,000 individually tracked emails by once using our Mail Merge
- Email marketing: measure your cold email effectiveness with Mail Merge

PRIVACY, SAFETY AND AUDIT

The Mailtrack Company processes personal data in accordance with European Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016. Mailtrack’s Privacy Policy and Terms of Use comply fully with GDPR, which is the toughest privacy and security law in the world.

Mailtrack passes an audit by Google every year for optimal security.

long.ca:
Mailtrack és el rastrejador d’e-mails per Gmail amb més de 1,5 milions d’usuaris actius.  

Fes un seguiment acurat. Pots conèixer el moment en el que s’han llegit els teus correus, rastrejar el número de clics i les vegades que el destinatari ha obert l’e-mail, i tot utilitzant només l’eina de Gmail. 

Afegeix els nostres ticks intuïtius (✓✓) al teu correu per als missatges llegits a la safata d’entrada del teu Gmail. 

Com utilitzar la nostra app de rastreig de correu:
✓ significa que el teu correu s’ha enviat, però no s’ha obert. 
✓✓ significa que el teu correu s’ha obert. 

Aquesta és la única eina de rastreig gratuïta a la Chrome Web Store per a fer seguiment dels correus, per sempre. 

RASTREIG DE MISSATGES LLEGITS
- Esbrina quins missatges s’han llegit 
- Deixa de preguntar si els teus companys llegeixen els teus e-mails 
- Accedeix al panell de control i filtra els correus que s’han “llegit” o “no llegit” 

MAILTRACK GRATUIT
- Un rastrejador d’e-mails gratuit i sense límits per a Gmail
- Campanya de Mailtrack: Envia e-mails de marketing amb Google fins a 200 contactes a la vegada
- Inclou la firma "Enviat amb Mailtrack" 

MAILTRACK PRO
- Informació extra sobre l’obertura de correus: fa quant de temps i quantes vegades
- Sense la firma de Mailtrack 
- Informació a temps real dels missatges llegits (notificacions d’ordinador o per correu) 
- Informes diaris sobre el rastreig 
- Enllaços per rastrejar 
- Recordatoris
- Última lectura: esbrina si el destinatari està interessat en els teus missatges
- Ajuda per e-mail i per telèfon 
- Vendes amb Mailtrack: Integra el servei amb Salesforce o el CRM que utilitzis

PER QUÈ MAILTRACK?
- Més de 5 milions de registres
- Més de 100.000 clients
- 4,5 estrelles (10.000 opinions)
- Amb presència a Forbes, Mashable, Inc, Lifehacker, The Next Web, Product Hunt...
- Utilitzat per professionals a: Uber, Yahoo, Harvard College, BBVA, LinkedIn…
- Segur: Auditat pel soci de seguretat òptima de Google

COM UTILITZAR EL RASTREJADOR DE CORREUS PER A GMAIL 
Troba respostes al nostre FAQs per saber més sobre Mailtrack.

PER A QUI ÉS?
- Account managers, empreses, equips de vendes i gent amb contacte directe amb clients
- Professionals que busquen augmentar la seva productivitat i el rastreig d’e-mails
- Equips, project managers, coordinadors i per comunicació interna
- Professionals independents i autònoms 
- Professionals que busquen feina 
- Qualsevol que envia correus amb Gmail 

Compatible amb Boomerang, Yesware, Streak, Mixmax, Bananatag i Hubspot Sales.

✓ Daily Reports: Receive by email a summary of the previous day’s tracking activity.
✓ Salesforce / CRM integration 
✓ CSV data Export with Mail Merge
✓ Works on iOS & Android: Send tracked mails from your phone’s Gmail app
✓ Email & phone support

WHEN TO USE MAILTRACK
- Job search: know whether your resume has been opened by the recruiter or not
- Sending Quotes: know if your your potential clients are engaged
- Invoices: know wether your bill been received or not
- Newsletters: send up to 1,000 individually tracked emails by once using our Mail Merge
- Email marketing: measure your cold email effectiveness with Mail Merge

PRIVACY, SAFETY AND AUDIT

The Mailtrack Company processes personal data in accordance with European Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016. Mailtrack’s Privacy Policy and Terms of Use comply fully with GDPR, which is the toughest privacy and security law in the world.

Mailtrack passes an audit by Google every year for optimal security.
long.da:
MailTrack.io is an email tracking app for Gmail that lets you know if the emails you’ve sent have been read or not. Mailtrack extension adds the double check marks to your Gmail. 

EMAIL TRACKING FOR GMAIL
- See which emails have been read, how long ago and how many times
- Stop asking if your colleagues read your emails
- Access our dashboard and filter emails that have been ‘read’ or ‘not read’
- Extension for Chrome, Firefox, Edge and Opera browsers

MAILTRACK BASIC FREE
- Free and unlimited email tracking
- Real-time alerts when your emails are open (desktop pop-up or by e-mail)
- Daily email tracking reports
- Link tracking
- Reminders

MAILTRACK PRO
- For professionals
- Unlimited features
- Ad-free signature
- Premium 24 hour support
- Light CRM integration: Send a copy to your management software

WHY MAILTRACK?
- More than 2 million sign-ups
- More than 5,000 excellent reviews in Chromestore
- Featured in Forbes, Mashable, Inc, Lifehacker, The Next Web,  Product Hunt...
- Used by professionals in: Google, Yahoo, Harvard College, BBVA, Pearson...

WHO IS IT FOR?
- Account managers, businesses, sales teams and people with direct client relationships
- Professionals looking to increase their productivity
- Teams, project managers, coordinators and internal communications
- Independent professionals and freelancers
- Professionals actively looking for employment
long.de:
Die Erweiterung MailTrack.io verfolgt Gmail- und Inbox-E-Mails und benachrichtigt Sie darüber, ob die von Ihnen gesendeten E-Mails gelesen wurden oder nicht. Die Mailtrack-Erweiterung kennzeichnet gelesene E-Mails mit zwei Häkchen. 

E-MAIL-TRACKING FÜR GMAIL UND INBOX

- Verfolgen Sie, welche E-Mails wann und wie oft gelesen wurden.
- Fragen Sie Ihre Kollegen nicht mehr, ob sie Ihre E-Mails gelesen haben.
- Öffnen Sie Ihr Dashboard und filtern Sie die E-Mails nach "gelesen" oder "nicht gelesen".
- Erweiterung für die Browser Chrome, Firefox, MS Edge und Opera

MAILTRACK BASIC FREE

- Kostenloses und unbegrenztes E-Mail-Tracking
- Echtzeit-Alarme, wenn Ihre E-Mails geöffnet sind (Desktop-Pop-up oder per E-Mail)
- Tägliche Berichte über das E-Mail-Tracking
- Link-Tracking
- Reminders

MAILTRACK PRO

- Für Spezialisten und Profis
- Voller Funktionsumfang
- Werbefreie Signatur
- 24 Stunden Premium-Support
- Light CRM Integration (Zoho CRM, Sugar CRM, Salesforce...) Senden einer Kopie an Ihre Verwaltungssoftware

WARUM MAILTRACK?

- Mehr als 2 Millionen Registrierungen
- ehr als 20.000 Kunden
- Mehr als 5.000 exzellente Bewertungen im Chrome Web Store
- Erwähnt in in Forbes, Mashable, Inc, Lifehacker, The Next Web, Product Hunt...
- Verwendet von den Profis von: Google, Yahoo, Harvard College, BBVA, Pearson...

FÜR WEN?

- Account-Manager, Verkaufsteams und direkte Kundenbeziehungen
- Spezialisten, die höhere Produktivität anstreben
- Projektmanager, Koordinatoren und die interne Kommunikation
- Unabhängige Spezialisten und Freelancer
- Spezialisten, die eine Anstellungen suchen
- Bereit für ein Upgrade von Gmail auf Inbox
long.en,en_AU:
Mailsuite® (formerly Mailtrack®) is an all-in-one relationship-building email tool with an email tracker, mail merge, document tracking and analytics, eSignature for documents, and confidential watermarking for Gmail™.

No credit card required – send unlimited tracked emails with Mailsuite to reach your clients at the perfect moment!

💡Why You Should Use Mailsuite® (formerly Mailtrack®): 
- Free email tracker for Gmail™ with patented technology
- Top reviews: 4.5 stars from over 10,000 reviews
- Featured in Forbes, Mashable, Inc, Lifehacker…and more!
- Used by professionals from: Uber, Indeed, Randstad, Keller Williams, Compass
- 100k+ paying subscribers, 2 million+ active users, and over 8 million registered users
- GDPR compliant and annual security audit by Google™
- Email marketing tool: Send campaigns with Mail Merge using Gmail™ and/or Google Sheets™.
- Bulk email service: Send up to 10,000 emails at the same time with high deliverability. Includes email bounce detection and automatic unsubscribe links.
- Email automation: Create, personalize, and send/schedule email campaigns directly in Gmail™.
- PDF document analytics (Delivery, Click, and Download reports)

How to use our mail tracker app?
1️⃣ Install the Mailsuite® email tracker extension
2️⃣ Send outreach emails normally: Mailsuite® will track all your emails automatically in Gmail™
3️⃣Open your “Sent emails” folder to immediately see the read receipt status
4️⃣One check mark ✓ means that your email has been sent successfully but not opened. Two check marks ✓✓ mean that your email has been opened by the recipient.
5️⃣Hover your mouse over the checkmarks to know exactly when and how many times your email has been opened 

💜Mailsuite® BENEFITS
👍Higher open rates and response rates than any other email tracker
👍Reach the inbox: With Mailsuite®, your emails and newsletters are less likely to end up in promotions or spam
👍Best deliverability for an email marketing tool
👍Set alerts to send follow-up emails on time
👍Mailsuite®’s easy-to-create Mail Merge connects with Google Sheets™
👍Includes bulk email features to automate and enhance your email marketing & Gmail™ templates
👍See how much time your recipients spend viewing your PDF attachments, both page by page and in total
👍Integrate with Salesforce™, your CRM, or 4,000+ other apps through Zapier

⚙️FEATURES
✓ Free and unlimited email tracking. Track as many emails as you want!
✓ Individual email tracker. Track group emails individually to see exactly who opened your email and when.
✓ Follow-up email reminder. Get notified when your emails are not opened or not replied to.
✓ Link tracking. Know when someone clicks on the links in your emails.
✓ Campaigns. Send individually tracked emails or email newsletters to up to 10,000 recipients at the same time. You can also schedule them to send later.
✓ Mail Merge in Gmail™. Personalize mass emails by automatically extracting data from Google Sheets™.
✓ Mail merge with attachments. Include secure PDF attachments in your mass emails and know when your PDF attachments are opened.
✓ PDF document tracking. See how much of the PDF document each recipient reads.
✓Page-by-page document analytics. Identify the pages where recipients spent the most time.
✓Document for signing. Convert any PDF into a signable document directly in Gmail™.
✓ Secure file sharing and transfer. Enhance protection of your documents, control who can access them and when, and see who has downloaded your PDF attachments.
✓Confidential PDF watermark. Easily add watermarks to PDFs from your inbox.
✓ Delivery Certificates. Instantly obtain proof that your emails have been delivered.
✓ Daily Reporting. Receive a daily summary of the previous day’s tracking activity.
✓ Salesforce™/CRM Integration. Automatically send a BCC copy of all emails to your CRM or email marketing software.
✓ Export Mail Merge Data to CSV. Create customized reports with your tracking data.
✓ Works on iOS & Android. Send tracked emails from your phone’s Gmail™ app.
✓ Email & Phone Support Available.

⏰When to use Mailsuite® (Mailtrack®):
- Job searches. Know whether your resume has been opened by recruiters.
- Sending quotes: See if your potential clients are interested in your product/service.
- Invoicing: Verify whether your invoice has been received or not.
- Newsletters: Quickly send up to 10,000 individually tracked emails at once.
- Cold emails: Measure the effectiveness of your cold outreach email campaigns.
- Speedy Coordination: The tracking tool helps coordinate tasks and approvals with clients for last-minute requests.
- Get your contract signed: Send contracts to one or multiple people for signature to solidify business relationships.

💜Mailsuite® is the best email marketing tool for:
- Startup founders. Raise funds through personalized and engaging email communications with investors. Securely share pitch decks and investor reports.
- Small business leaders. Build trust with your potential clients using our streamlined features, all without changing your inbox habits.
- Sales representatives. Humanize your email communication while keeping it simple and efficient with our campaign insights and personalized mail merge.
- Marketers. Save time on your email marketing and improve email opens, clicks and other key metrics through our detailed campaign reporting. 
- HR. Get more responses from job candidates, send employee newsletters effortlessly, and make them more engaging with our email tracker and outreach analytics.
- Lawyers. Share your legal documents safely and get them signed without ever leaving your inbox.
- And for many more roles!

----------------------------------------------------
PRIVACY, SAFETY AND AUDIT
Mailsuite® processes personal data in accordance with European Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016. Mailsuite®’s Privacy Policy and Terms of Use comply fully with GDPR, which is the strictest privacy and security law in the world.

Mailsuite® passes an audit by Google™ every year to ensure optimal security.
----------------------------------------------------
long.es,es_419:
Haz seguimientos más precisos de tus conversaciones usando la interfaz de Gmail de siempre. Entérate al instante cuando alguien lee tus emails y trackea el número de clics y aperturas de cada destinatario.

Añade los checks (✓✓) a Gmail para ver las confirmaciones de lectura desde tu misma bandeja de entrada:
✓     significa que tu email ha sido entregado, pero aún no ha sido abierto.
✓✓  indican que tu correo ha sido abierto.

Mailtrack es el único tracker de email de la Web Store gratuito para siempre. 

TRACKING DE CORREOS CON CONFIRMACIÓN DE LECTURA
- Descubre cuáles de tus correos han sido leídos
- Deja de preguntar a tus compañeros si ya han leído tus correos
- Accede al Panel de control y filtra los correos leídos y los que no

MAILTRACK FREE
- Seguimiento de correos electronicos ilimitado y gratuito para Gmail
- Mailtrack Campaign: envía campañas de email marketing con Gmail a un máximo de 200 contactos a la vez
- Incluye la firma "Remitente notificado con Mailtrack"

MAILTRACK PRO
- Sin la firma de Mailtrack
- Información adicional sobre aperturas: hace cuánto y cuántas veces se ha abierto cada correo
- Confirmaciones de lectura en tiempo real (por correo o notificación de escritorio)
- Tracking de enlaces
- Leído por última vez: descubre cómo interactúan con tus correos
- Mailtrack Ventas: integra Mailtrack con Salesforce o tu herramienta de CRM preferida
- Informes de seguimiento diarios
- Recordatorios
- Asistencia por teléfono y por correo electrónico

¿POR QUÉ MAILTRACK? 
- Más de 5 millones de usuarios registrados
- Más de 100 000 clientes
- 4.4 estrellas a partir de más de 10 000 opiniones
- Mencionado por Forbes, Mashable, Inc., Lifehacker, The Next Web, Product Hunt y muchos más
- Usado por profesionales de Uber, Yahoo, Harvard, BBVA y LinkedIn, entre otros
- 100 % seguro: auditado por un partner de Google para máxima seguridad

APRENDE A UTILIZAR MAILTRACK EN GMAIL
Visita nuestra sección de preguntas frecuentes para encontrar toda la información sobre Mailtrack.

¿PARA QUIÉN ES?
- Gerentes de cuentas, empresarios, equipos de ventas y cualquiera que trate con clientes
- Profesionales que quieren aumentar su productividad y trackear correos
- Equipos, gestores de proyectos, coordinadores y comunicadores
- Emprendedores y autónomos
- Profesionales en búsqueda activa de empleo
- Usuarios de Gmail

Compatible con Boomerang, Yesware, Streak, Mixmax, Bananatag y Hubspot Sales.
long.fr:
MailTrack.io est une extension de tracking de mails pour Gmail et Inbox qui vous permet de savoir si les e-mails que vous avez envoyé ont été lus ou non. L'extension Mailtrack fonctionne avec Gmail et G Suite en ajoutant le  doublé-check à vos messages Gmail.

SUIVI DES MAILS POUR GMAIL ET INBOX

- Voir quels e-mails ont été lus, depuis combien de temps et combien de fois
- Ne plus demander si vos collègues ont lu vos messages
- Accéder à votre tableau de bord et filtrer les e-mails qui ont été 'lus' ou 'non lus'
- Extension pour les navigateurs Chrome, Firefox, MS Edge et Opera

MAILTRACK BASIC GRATUIT

- Suivi des mails gratuit et illimité
- Alertes en temps réel lorsque vos e-mails sont ouverts (pop-up de bureau ou par e-mail)
- Des rapports de lecture
- Un suivi des liens
- Reminders

MAILTRACK PRO

- Pour les professionnels utilisant Gmail ou Inbox
- Fonctionnalités illimitées
- Sans la signature “Sent with MailTrack”
- Assistance premium dans 24 heures
- Intégration avec votre CRM (Zoho CRM, Sugar CRM, Salesforce…) En envoyant une copie à votre software de gestion

POURQUOI CHOISIR MAILTRACK ?

- Dejà plus de 2 millions d’inscriptions
- Plus de 20 000 clients
- Plus de 5 000 excellentes commentaires reçus dans le Chrome Web Store
- Mentionnée à Forbes, Mashable, Inc, Lifehacker, The Next Web, Product Hunt...
- Utilisé par des professionnels  à Google, Yahoo, Harvard College, BBVA, Pearson...

POUR QUI ?

- Gestionnaires de comptes, entreprises, équipes de vente et personnes ayant des relations directes avec la clientèle
- Professionnels cherchant à accroître leur productivité
- Équipes, chefs de projet, coordinateurs et communications internes
- Travailleurs indépendants (particuliers, travailleurs freelance) et les personnes recherchant activement un emploi
- Toute personne qui envoie des e-mails depuis Gmail ou Inbox.
long.hu:
A MailTrack.io jelzi Önnek, hogy az elküldött e-mailjeit elolvasták-e. A bővítmény Gmail és Google alkalmazásokkal működik, teljesen ingyenesen és korlátlan ideig használható.
 
E-MAIL NYOMKÖVETÉS
- Megtekintheti, hogy mely üzenetét olvasták el, az elolvasás pontos idejét, valamint azt, hogy hányszor és milyen készülékről nyitották meg az e-mailt.
- Hozzáférést kap egy olyan vezérlőpulthoz, mely megjeleníti, hogy mely üzeneteit nem olvasták még el
 
JELZÉSEK ÉS ÉRTESÍTÉSEK
Annak érdekében, hogy ne kelljen folyamatosan az üzenetei állapotát figyelnie:
- E-mailes értesítést kap minden alkalommal, amikor elolvassák üzenetét. Az értesítés elmentésére lehetősége van
- Az asztali értesítések segítségével azonnal értesül a fejleményekről
 
EXTRA SZOLGÁLTATÁSOK
Amennyiben szeretné, a MailTrack munkához kialakított verzióját is megvásárolhatja, mely a következő szolgáltatásokat kínálja:
- Napi olvasottsági jelentés
- Hivatkozáskövetés
- Prémium személyes támogatás
- Integráció a CRM-jével: SalesForce, Sugar CRM, Zoho, stb.
 
MIÉRT VÁLASSZA A MAILTRACKET?
- Már több mint 2 millió telepítették
- Több mint 20.000 ügyfél
- Több mint 5000 kiváló értékeléssel rendelkezik
- Ingyenes. Próbálja ki! Nem kerül Önnek semmibe
- Megjelent már a Mashable-ön, a The Next Weben, a Product Hunton és a Lifehackeren is
 
KINEK LETT KIALAKÍTVA?
- Értékesítési vezetőknek, vállalatoknak, értékesítő csoportoknak és olyanoknak, akik közvetlen ügyfélkörrel rendelkeznek
- Professzionális munkavállalóknak, akiknek termelékenységük növelése a cél
- Csapatoknak, projektvezetőknek, koordinátoroknak és cégen belüli kommunikációra
- Függetlenek egyéneknek (egyéni munkavállalók, szabadúszók) és olyanoknak, akik aktív munkakeresők
long.it:
MailTrack.io è un'estensione di monitoraggio delle e-mail per Gmail e Google Inbox che consente di sapere se i messaggi inviati sono stati letti o meno. L'estensione Mailtrack aggiunge la doppia spunta al tuo account Gmail. 

TRACKING DELLE E-MAIL PER GMAIL E GOOGLE INBOX

- Controlla quali messaggi sono stati letti, quanto tempo fa e quante volte
- Non dovrai più chiedere ai colleghi se hanno letto le tue e-mail
- Accedi alla nostra dashboard e filtra le e-mail "lette" o "non lette"
- Estensione compatibile con i browser Chrome, Firefox, Edge e Opera che ti permette di tenere traccia delle email

MAILTRACK FREE

- Tracking illimitato e gratuito delle e-mail per Gmail e Inbox
- Firma con "Sent with Mailtrack"

MAILTRACK BASIC 

- Tracking illimitato e gratuito delle e-mail per Gmail e Inbox
- Firma senza contenuti pubblicitari


MAILTRACK PRO

- Per i professionisti che utilizzano Gmail o Inbox
- Firma senza contenuti pubblicitari
- Avvisi in tempo reale quando le tue e-mail vengono aperte (finestra a comparsa sul desktop o via e-mail)
- Report giornalieri di tracking delle e-mail
- Tracking dei link
- Reminders
- Supporto premium 24 ore su 24
- Integrazione Light CRM (Zoho CRM, Sugar CRM, Salesforce…) Invia una copia al tuo software di gestione

PERCHÉ SCEGLIERE MAILTRACK?

- Più di 2 milione di iscrizioni
- Più di 30.000 clienti
- Più di 5.000 ottime recensioni sul Chrome Web Store
- In evidenza su Forbes, Mashable, Inc, Lifehacker, The Next Web, Product Hunt...
- Usato dai professionisti di: Google, Yahoo, Harvard College, BBVA, Pearson...

A CHI È DESTINATO?

- Account manager, team di vendita e individui a contatto diretto con i clienti
- Professionisti che desiderano aumentare la loro produttività
- Team Leaders, Project Managers, coordinatori e addetti alle comunicazioni interne
- Professionisti indipendenti e liberi professionisti
- Professionisti attivamente in cerca di occupazione
- Chiunque invia email da Gmail o Inbox by Gmail.

Compatible con: Boomerang, Yesware, Streak, Bananatag and Hubspot Sales.
long.ja:
MailTrack.io は、送信済みメールの既読状態を確認するための Gmail および Inbox 用のメール追跡用の拡張機能です。 Mailtrack 拡張機能は、お使いの Gmail にダブルチェックマークを追加します. 

GMAIL と INBOX 用のメール追跡機能

- どのメールが読まれたのか、またメールが読まれた時間や回数を把握できます
- 同僚にメールを読んだかどうか確認するのを止めてください
- ダッシュボードにアクセスして、「既読」または「未読」のメールをフィルター表示できます
- Chrome、Firefox、Edge  および Opera ブラウザ用の拡張機能

MAILTRACK BASIC 無料版

- 無料かつ無制限のメール追跡機能
- メールが開封された際にリアルタイムに通知します（デスクトップのポップアップ表示またはメールで通知）
- 日次メール追跡レポート
- リンク追跡
- リマインダー

MAILTRACK PRO

- プロフェッショナル向け
- 機能無制限
- 広告なしの署名
- プレミアム 24 時間サポート
- 軽量 CRM との統合（Zoho CRM、Sugar CRM、Salesforce…). コピーをお使いの管理ソフトウェアへ送信します.

MAILTRACK を選ぶ理由

- 200 万人以上のユーザーがサインアップしています
- Chrome ウェブストアで 5,000 件以上の最高評価のレビューを獲得
- Forbes、Mashable, Inc、Lifehacker、The Next Web、Product Hunt などで特集されました
- 次の団体に所属する専門家が利用しています: Google、Yahoo、Harvard College、BBVA、Pearson など...

どのような人に適していますか？

- 経理担当者、業務部門、販売チームや顧客と直接関係を持つ人々
- 生産性向上を目標に掲げる専門家
- チーム、プロジェクトマネージャー、コーディネーターおよび社内広報部門
- 独立した専門職の方やフリーランサーの方
- 積極的に求職活動を行っている専門家
long.ko:
MailTrack.io는 보낸 이메일을 상대방이 읽거나 읽지 않았는지 알 수 있게 하는 Gmail 및 받은 편지함에 대한 이메일 추적 확장입니다. Mailtrack 확장은 Gmail에 더블 체크 마크를 추가합니다.

GMAIL 및 받은 편지함용 이메일 추적

- 어느 이메일을 읽었는지, 몇 시간 전인지, 몇 번인지 보기
- 더 이상 동료 직원에게 내 이메일을 읽었는지 물어볼 필요 없음
- 당사 대시보드에 액세스하여 '읽음' 또는 '읽지 않음'인 이메일 필터링
- Chrome, Firefox, Edge 및 Opera 브라우저용 확장

MAILTRACK BASIC 무료

- 무료 그리고 무제한 이메일 추적
- 상대방이 이메일을 열면 실시간 알림 제공(데스크톱 팝업 또는 이메일로)
- 일일 이메일 추적 보고서
- 링크 추적
- 미리 알림

MAILTRACK PRO

- 전문가용
- 무제한 기능
- 광고 없는 시그니처
- 프리미엄 24시간 지원
- 라이트 CRM 통합(Zoho CRM, Sugar CRM, Salesforce…), 해당 관리 소프트웨어로 사본 보내기

MAILTRACK이어야 하는 이유는?

- 200만 이상 등록
- Chrome 웹 스토어에서 5,000만 건 이상의 우수한 리뷰
- Forbes, Mashable, Inc, Lifehacker, The Next Web,  Product Hunt에 포함됨...
- 다음의 전문가들이 사용: Google, Yahoo, Harvard College, BBVA, Pearson... 

대상 사용자는?

- 계정 관리자, 비즈니스, 세일즈 팀 및 다이렉트 클라이언트 관계가 있는 사람들
- 생산성을 늘리길 원하는 전문가
- 팀, 프로젝트 관리자, 코디네이터 및 내부 통신
- 독립적 전문가 및 프리랜서
- 활발히 일자리를 찾고 있는 전문가
long.nl:
MailTrack.io is een extensie om e-mail te tracken voor Gmail en Inbox, waarmee u kunt weten of verzonden e-mails al dan niet gelezen werden.  Mailtrack-extensies voegen dubbele vinkjes toe aan uw Gmail. 

E-MAILTRACKING VOOR GMAIL EN INBOX
- Kom te weten welke e-mails gelezen werden, hoe lang geleden en hoeveel keer
- Vraag uzelf niet langer af of uw collega's uw e-mails wel gelezen hebben
- Ga naar ons dashboard en filter 'gelezen' en ongelezen' e-mails
- Extensie voor Chrome, Firefox, Edge en Opera

MAILTRACK BASIC FREE

- Gratis en onbeperkte e-mailtracking
- Real-time alerts when your emails are open (desktop pop-up or by e-mail)
- Dagelijkse rapporten voor e-mailtracking 
- Linktracking
- Reminders

MAILTRACK PRO

- Voor professionele gebruikers
- Onbeperkte functies
- Handtekening zonder publiciteit
- De klok rond premiumondersteuning
- Light CRM-integratie (Zoho CRM, Sugar CRM, Salesforce …). Stuur een kopie naar uw managementsoftware

WAAROM ZOU U MAILTRACK GEBRUIKEN?

- Meer dan 2 miljoen inschrijvingen
- Meer dan 20.000 klanten
- Meer dan 5.000 uitstekende beoordelingen in Chrome Web Store
- Besprekingen in Forbes, Mashable, Inc, Lifehacker, The Next Web,  Product Hunt ...
- Toegepast door professionele gebruikers van: Google, Yahoo, Harvard College, BBVA, Pearson ...

WIE KAN GEBRUIK MAKEN VAN MAILTRACK?

- Accountmanagers, bedrijven, verkoopteams en personen met directe klantrelaties
- Professionele gebruikers die hun productiviteit willen verhogen
- Teams, projectmanagers, coördinatoren en diensten voor interne communicatie

- Professionele gebruikers die actief naar werk zoeken
long.no:
Mailtrack er en e-postsporings extension for Gmail og Inbox som sier i fra om e-postene dine er lest eller ikke. Mailtrack-utvidelsen legger til doble sjekkmarkører i din Gmail eller Inbox. Den eneste e-postsporeren i Chrome Web Store som lar deg spore e-poster helt gratis for alltid.

EMAIL TRACKING FOR GMAIL

- Se hvilke e-poster som er lest, hvor lenge siden og hvor mange ganger.
- Aldri mer masing på kolleger om de har lest e-posten eller ei.
- Gå til vårt panel og sorter e-postene som er "lest" eller "ikke lest"
- Utvidelse for nettleserne Chrome, Firefox, Edge og Opera

MAILTRACK BASIC GRATIS

- Gratis og uendelig e-postsporing
- Varsler i sanntid når e-poster åpnes (pop-up på skrivebord eller e-post)
- Daglige rapporter over e-postsporinger
- Lenkesporing
- Påminnelser

MAILTRACK PRO

- For profesjonelle i Gmail eller Inbox
- Ubegrensede funksjoner
- Reklamefri signatur
- Førsteklasses 24-timers kundestøtte
- Enkel CRM-integrering: Send en kopi til behandlingsprogramvaren din

HVORFOR MAILTRACK?
- Mer enn 2 million påmeldinger
- Mer enn 20.000 kunder
- Mer enn 5.000 fantastiske vurderinger i Chromestore
- Omtalt i Forbes, Mashable, Inc, Lifehacker, The Next Web, Product Hunt ...
- Brukt av profesjonelle i: Google, Yahoo, Harvard College, BBVA, Pearson …
- Kan oppgraderes fra Gmail til Inbox

HVEM ER DEN FOR?
- Regnskapførere, forretninger, salgsteam og personer med direkte klientforhold
- Profesjonelle som ser etter metoder for å øke produktiviteten
- Team, prosjektledere, koordinatorer og interne kommunikasjonssystemer
- Uavhengige profesjonelle og frilansere
- Profesjonelle på jakt etter ny jobb
- Alle som sender e-post med Gmail eller Inbox
long.pl:
MailTrack.io to rozszerzenie dla usługi Gmail oraz Inbox, które informuje o tym, czy wysłane przez użytkownika e-maile zostały przeczytane. Mailtrack dodaje do usługi Gmail podwójne znaczniki. 

ŚLEDZENIE E-MAILI DLA USŁUG GMAIL I INBOX

- Dowiedz się, które e-maile zostały przeczytane, kiedy oraz ile razy
- Zrezygnuj z konieczności dopytywania współpracowników, czy odebrali twoją wiadomość
- Przejdź do pulpitu nawigacyjnego i filtruj e-maile według przeczytanych i nieprzeczytanych
- Rozszerzenie dostępne dla przeglądarek Chrome, Firefox, Edge i Opera

DARMOWA WERSJA PODSTAWOWA MAILTRACK

- Darmowe i nieograniczone śledzenie e-maili
- Powiadomienia w czasie rzeczywistym w chwili otwarcia wiadomości (wyskakujące okienko lub e-mail)
- Codzienne raporty podsumowujące
- Łącze śledzące
- Przypomnienia

MAILTRACK PRO

- Dla profesjonalnych użytkowników
- Nieograniczony dostęp do funkcji
- Podpis wolny od reklam
- 24-godzinna obsługa techniczna
- Częściowa integracja CRM (Zoho CRM, Sugar CRM, Salesforce…). Wyślij kopię do oprogramowania zarządzającego

DLACZEGO MAILTRACK?

- Ponad 2 miliony rejestracji
- Ponad 20 000 klientów
- Ponad 5 tysiące pozytywnych opinii w Chrome Web Store
- Recenzje w portalach Forbes, Mashable, Inc, Lifehacker, The Next Web, Product Hunt itp.
- Stosowany przez profesjonalistów w: Google, Yahoo, Harvardzie, BBVA, Pearson...

PROFIL UŻYTKOWNIKA

- Opiekuni klienta, przedsiębiorstwa, zespoły sprzedaży oraz pracownicy będący w bezpośrednim kontakcie z klientem
- Użytkownicy chcący zwiększyć produktywność
- Zespoły, kierownicy projektów, koordynatorzy i firmy do komunikacji wewnętrznej
- Niezależni specjaliści i freelancerzy
- Specjaliści aktywnie poszukujący zleceń
- Każdy, kto wysyła e-maile z Gmail lub Inbox by Gmail
long.pt_BR,pt_PT:
O Mailtrack é o principal rastreador gratuito de email para o Gmail, com mais de 1,5 milhão de usuários ativos.
 
Acompanhamento e follow-ups precisos. Descubra quando seus emails são lidos, acompanhe o número de cliques e quantas vezes um destinatário abriu o email; tudo na interface padrão do Gmail.
 
Adicione nossas marcas de seleção intuitivas (✓✓) ao seu email para visualizar confirmações de leitura do Gmail diretamente na sua caixa de entrada.
 
Como usar nosso aplicativo de rastreamento de email:
✓ significa que seu email foi enviado, mas ainda não foi aberto.
✓✓ significa que seu email foi aberto.
 
Este é o único rastreador de email gratuito na Chrome Web Store que rastreia emails gratuitamente para sempre.
 
EMAIL TRACKER PARA CONFIRMAÇÕES DE LEITURA
- Saiba quais emails foram lidos
- Pare de perguntar se seus colegas leram seus emails
- Acesse nosso painel e filtre os emails por 'lidos' ou 'não lidos'
 
MAILTRACK GRÁTIS
- Rastreador de email gratuito e ilimitado para o Gmail
- Mailtrack Campaign: envie email marketing pelo email do Google para até 200 contatos de uma só vez
- Inclui assinatura "Enviado com o Mailtrack"
 
MAILTRACK PRO
- Informações extras sobre a leitura de email: há quanto tempo e quantas vezes
- Sem assinatura do Mailtrack
- Confirmações de leitura do Gmail em tempo real (notificação na área de trabalho ou por email)
- Relatórios diários de rastreamento de email
- Rastreamento de links
- Lembretes
- Última leitura: saiba se o destinatário está engajado nas mensagens
- Suporte por email e telefone
- Mailtrack Sales: integração com Salesforce ou ao CRM de sua preferência
 
POR QUE ESCOLHER O MAILTRACK?
- Mais de 5 milhões de inscrições ao serviço
- Mais de 100.000 clientes
- 4,5 estrelas (10.000 avaliações)
- Destaque na Forbes, Mashable, Inc, Lifehacker, The Next Web, Product Hunt...
- Utilizado por profissionais do: Uber, Yahoo, Harvard College, BBVA, Linkedin…
- Seguro: auditado por parceiros do Google para segurança garantida
 
COMO USAR O SEU RASTREADOR DE EMAIL NO GMAIL
Consulte nossas perguntas frequentes a qualquer momento para obter todas as respostas relacionadas ao Mailtrack.
 
QUEM PODE SE BENEFICIAR?
- Gerentes de conta, empresas, equipes de vendas e pessoas com relacionamento direto com clientes
- Profissionais que buscam aumentar sua produtividade e rastrear emails
- Equipes, gerentes de projeto, coordenadores e profissionais de comunicação interna
- Profissionais independentes e freelancers
- Profissionais que buscam por um emprego ativamente
- Qualquer pessoa que envie emails pelo Gmail
 
Compatível com Boomerang, Yesware, Streak, Mixmax, Bananatag e Hubspot Sales.
long.ru,uk:
MailTrack.io это расширение для отслеживания писем в системах Gmail и Inbox которое позволяет вам знать были письма прочитаны получателем или нет. Расширение добавляет в интерфейс Gmail специальные маркеры с увеличенным набором значений. 

EMAIL TRACKING FOR GMAIL И INBOX

- Получите возможность видеть какие из писем уже прочитаны, как давно и сколько раз
- Прекратите спрашивать коллег прочитали ли они ваши письма
- Зайдите в почтовый ящик и отфильтруйте письма на 'прочитанные' и 'непрочитанные'
- Расширение предназначено для Chrome, Firefox, Edge и Opera

MAILTRACK FREE
- Бесплатное и неограниченное отслеживание писем


MAILTRACK BASIC
- Бесплатное и неограниченное отслеживание писем
- Отсутствие рекламы


MAILTRACK PRO
- Для профессионалов
- Отсутствие рекламы
- Уведомления об открытии вашего письма в реальном времени (на рабочем столе или по электронной почте)
- Ежедневные отчеты о результатах отслеживания
- Отслеживание ссылок
- Напоминания
- Неограниченный функционал
- Первоклассная круглосуточная поддержка
- Простая интеграция с CRM-системами (Zoho CRM, Sugar CRM, Salesforce…) и возможность отправки в них копий все писем

ПОЧЕМУ ИМЕННО MAILTRACK?

- Более двух миллионов зарегистрированных пользователей
- Более 20 000 клиентов
- Более 5000 отличных отзывов в интернет-магазине Chrome
- Используется в Forbes, Mashable, Inc, Lifehacker, The Next Web,  Product Hunt...
- Используется профессионалами в: Google, Yahoo, Harvard College, BBVA, Pearson...

ДЛЯ КОГО ЭТО?

- Аккаунт-менеджеры, предприниматели, отделы продаж и сотрудники непосредственно взаимодействующие с клиентами
- Специалисты, желающие повысить свою продуктивность
- Команды, менеджеры проектов, координаторы и просто те кто взаимодействует друг с другом
- Независимые специалисты и фрилансеры
- Профессионалы, активно ищущие работу
- Любой, кто отправляет письма Gmail или Inbox от Gmail.
long.sv:
MailTrack.io är ett e-postspårningstillägg för Gmail och Inkorgen som meddelar om dina skickade e-postmeddelanden har lästs eller inte. Mailtrack-tillägget lägger till dubbla kryssmarkeringar på din Gmail. 

E-POSTSPÅRNING FÖR GMAIL OCH INKORGEN

- Se vilka e-postmeddelanden som har lästs, när de lästes och hur många gånger
- Sluta fråga dina kollegor om de har läst dina e-postmeddelanden
- Åtkomst till vår instrumentpanel och filter för e-postmeddelanden som är "lästa" eller "olästa"
- Tillägg för Chrome, Firefox, Edge och Opera

MAILTRACK FREE

- Gratis och obegränsad e-postspårning
- "Sent with Mailtrack" signatur


MAILTRACK BASIC

- Gratis och obegränsad e-postspårning
- Reklamfri signatur


MAILTRACK PRO

- För proffs
- Reklamfri signatur
- Aviseringar i realtid när dina e-postmeddelanden har öppnats (popup-fönster på skrivbordet eller via e-post)
- Dagliga e-postspårningsrapporter
- Länkspårning
- Påminnelser
- Premiumsupport dygnet runt
- Light CRM-integrering (Zoho CRM, Sugar CRM, Salesforce…) Skicka en kopia till ledningsprogrammet

VARFÖR MAILTRACK?

- Över 2 miljoner registreringar
- Mer än 30 000 kunder.
- Mer än 5 000 utmärkta omdömen i Chrome Web Store
- Har medverkat i Forbes, Mashable, Inc, Lifehacker, The Next Web,  Product Hunt...
- Används av professionella inom: Google, Yahoo, Harvard College, BBVA, Pearson...

VEM ANVÄNDER DEN?

- Kontoansvariga, företag, försäljningsteam och personer som har direkta klientförhållanden
- Professionella som vill förbättra sin produktivitet
- Lag, projektledare, samordnare och intern kommunikation
- Oberoende professionella och frilansare
- Professionella som aktivt är på jakt efter anställning
- Den som skickar e-postmeddelanden från Gmail eller Inbox.

Kompatibel med Boomerang, Yesware, Streak, Bananatag and Hubspot Sales.
long.tr:
MailTrack.io, Gmail ve Inbox üzerinden gönderdiğiniz e-postaların okunup okunmadığını öğrenmenizi sağlayan bir e-posta izleme eklentisidir. Mailtrack eklentisi, Gmail'e çift onay işareti ekler. 

GMAIL VE INBOX İÇİN E-POSTA İZLEME

- Gönderdiğiniz e-postaların okunup okunmadığını, ne zaman okunduğunu ve kaç defa  okunduğunu öğrenin
- Meslektaşlarınıza e-postalarınızı okuyup okumadıklarını sormakla uğraşmayın
- Kontrol panelimize erişin ve e-postalarınızı 'okundu' veya 'okunmadı' olarak filtreleyin
- Chrome, Firefox, Edge ve Opera tarayıcılarıyla uyumlu

MAILTRACK BASIC-ÜCRETSİZ

- Ücretsiz ve sınırsız e-posta izleme
- E-postalarınızın açık olduğu zamanlarda gerçek zamanlı uyarılar alın (masaüstü açılır penceresi veya e-posta ile)
- Günlük e-posta izleme raporları
- Bağlantı izleme
- Hatırlatıcılar

MAILTRACK PRO

- Profesyoneller için
- Sınırsız özellik
- Reklamsız imza
- 24 saat Premium destek
- Light CRM entegrasyonu (Zoho CRM, Sugar CRM, Salesforce...) Yönetim yazılımınıza bir kopyasını gönderin

NEDEN MAILTRACK?

- 2 milyondan  fazla kayıtlı kullanıcı
- 20.000'den fazla müşteri
- Chrome Web Mağazasında 5.000'den fazla mükemmel yorum
- Forbes, Mashable, Inc, Lifehacker, The Next Web ve  Product Hunt özellikli
- Profesyoneller tarafından kullanım alanları: Google, Yahoo, Harvard College, BBVA, Pearson...

KİMLER İÇİN?

- Hesap yöneticileri, işletmeler, satış ekipleri ve doğrudan müşteri ilişkileri
- Üretkenliklerini artırmak isteyen profesyoneller
- Takımlar, proje yöneticileri, koordinatörler ve dahili iletişim için
- Bağımsız profesyoneller ve serbest çalışanlar
- Aktif olarak iş arayan profesyoneller
long.zh_CN:
MailTrack.io 是一款 Gmail 和 Inbox 电子邮件跟踪扩展程序，可是让你了解你发送的电子邮件是否为已读或未读。Mailtrack 扩展程序会为你的 Gmail 加上复选标记。 

Gmail 和 Inbox 电子邮件跟踪
- 查看电子邮件是否已被阅读、阅读时间和阅读次数
- 不用费心劳力追问同事是否已经看了你发送的电子邮件
- 通过 Dashboard 筛选“已读”或“未读”的电子邮件
- 该扩展适用于 Chrome、Firefox、Edge 和 Opera 浏览器

Mailtrack Basic 免费

- 免费使用，无限电子邮件跟踪
- 电子邮件被打开时有实时提醒（桌面弹窗或电子邮件通知）
- 每日电子邮件跟踪报表
- 链接跟踪
- 提醒

Mailtrack Pro

- 适合专业用户
- 功能无任何限制
- 免广告
- 24 小时全天候支持
- 轻度 CRM 系统集成（Zoho CRM、Sugar CRM、Salesforce…）。向你的管理软件发送副本

为什么选择 Mailtrack？

- 超过一百万注册用户
- Chrome Web Store 超过 5000 好评
- 在 Forbes、Mashable、Inc、Lifehacker、The Next Web 和 Product Hunt 等获得了推荐
- 被下列企业采用：Google, Yahoo, Harvard College, BBVA, Pearson...

面向的用户？

- 客户经理、业务团队、销售团队以及直接面向客户的人员
- 希望提高生产力的用户
- 团队、项目经理、协调人员和内部通讯
- 独立专业人士和自由职业者
- 正在求职的专业人士
